title: LF People for Ranked 5s Gold+
body:
Hello everyone, im looking for players that are Gold or higher to play ranked 5s with currently im looking for these roles

Top
ADC
Supp
Mid (might be open)

id also be open to having more then one person in every role, the team is for fun but it would be nice to get a decent rank 
either add me in game and talk to me about it there or post on here and we can go from there and for those who want to play in a serious environment im also open to that as long as the entire team is willing to be serious about it
Thanks for stopping by everyone

replies.body: Hi i am bronze can i join?
hi, as stated above i would prefer players closer to my skill level as i am with high mmr i would prefer to playing with other gold players
